column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Dominic P. had the classic ribeye
column2: which was the best steak I've ever eaten.  It was a massive steak
column4: and he ended up taking a chunk home.  The Bearnaise sauce is the most creamy
column6: artery-clogging goodness ever.  You better believe I stole some of it for my own steak.  His steak was cooked medium-rare
column8: but it was still out of this world!
